title: (x) Quirky serif font "Happy Mother's day!" card - Cochin Archaic {Pieter}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320132852im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hmd_4064.png)

This is a scan from a letterpress printed greetings card, so I'm not certain there's a digital version. The card company have other samples on their website, although the quality isn't ideal: [http://www.smudgeink.com/cgi/shopper.cgi?preadd=action&key=11001006](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320132852/http:/www.smudgeink.com/cgi/shopper.cgi?preadd=action&key=11001006 "http://www.smudgeink.com/cgi/shopper.cgi?preadd=action&key=11001006") Can anyone identify it?
author: d a n i e l
